Modeling.action: The relevant library and dataset have been imported and loaded. Now, move on to the next video to learn how to look at the dataset.
I have already loaded the dataset for you! Exploring and understanding the dataset and its attributes is the first step to doing exploratory data analysis.

Coaching.action: Now you try exploring the data on your own! Select a column below and look at a description and distribution just like Dave!

Reflection.action: Nice work on this part! Now execute the whole code cell and see what you get.

Modeling.action: [Use one sentence to tell the student here are some key points while doing chart interpretation][Based on the transcript, use three bullet points to briefly teach the student how to do chart interpretation. Requirement: each bullet point should contain only one sentence]

Articulation.action: Propose a multiple-choice question for possible patterns in the visualization for the student to select the pattern they found. Please respond with the following json structure without the ```json``` title: {"question": "question", "choices": ["choice", "choice", "choice"]}

Exploration.action: Propose a multiple-choice question for possible reasons behind the pattern for the student to answer. The question should lead the student to generate new visualization intent. Please respond with the following json structure without the ```json``` title: {"question": "question", "choices": ["choice", "choice", "choice"]}

Scaffolding.action: [Use one sentence to give feedback on the student's choice][Use one sentence to tell the student if any additional steps could confirm their choice][Have students watch the next video and keep the choice in mind to see if it is justified]

The blank should be about the attributes or the plot functions or the parameters that the student should learn from the video)[Use one sentence to let the student finish the code and execute the code cell]}{else if the student's choice could be proved by using some facts on the internet: [Use less than three sentence to summarize some facts on the internet]}
